resources.string:
Thank you for downloading our app! I am Matthew Shoemaker (as you may have gathered by this point). 

As of the creation of this app (Summer 2017) I am enrolled as a student in The Ohio State University, majoring in Computer Science and Engineering, and I have just completed my Freshman Year!

During the project, I was in charge of doing the coding and UI manipulation for the app! This is the very first app that I have ever created, so thank you for giving it a try! 

We are under no pretenses that this is a perfect app, so if you run into issues, please inform us and we will do absolutely everything in our power to correct the issue!
